articles.title: DuPage County to open vaccination site at fairgrounds amid frustration over supply - Chicago Daily Herald
articles.description: A COVID-19 testing center in Wheaton will convert to a vaccination site as DuPage County builds the infrastructure needed for mass immunization and confronts frustration over a vaccine supply overwhelmed by demand.
articles.content: A COVID-19 testing center in Wheaton will be converted into a vaccination site as DuPage County builds the infrastructure needed for mass immunization and confronts frustration over a vaccine supply … [+3766 chars]
